Name: Edugate Cairo Fair 2025
Description: A large-scale educational fair bringing together top Egyptian and international universities. High school and college students can explore study options, meet admission officers, and attend workshops on scholarships, application tips, and career paths.

Name: Edugate Alexandria Fair
Description: An educational event focused on serving students in Northern Egypt. Universities will present their programs, offer consultations, and provide application support for students and parents.

Name: UH Experience Day
Description: Spend a day as a UH student! Attend real lectures, explore our UK-accredited programs, and meet current students and faculty.

Name: AUC Summer Academy Kickoff
Description: Intro session for high schoolers to explore AUC’s summer programs. Includes a tour and sessions with current students and faculty.

Name: BUE Career Path Conference
Description: Explore career options in engineering, business, and law with alumni panels, employer booths, and CV workshops.

Name: EUE Online Open Day
Description: Join a virtual orientation to learn how Egypt’s top e-learning university works. Includes system demos and live faculty Q&A.

Name: ERU Engineering Showcase Day
Description: Senior ERU students present graduation projects in robotics, construction, and AI. Industry guests and prizes included.
